title: Research Report Preview
description: Gain deep insights into user behavior, needs, and pain points through AI-powered user research. Below is a comprehensive report generated from recent interviews and data analysis.

charts.title: Interview & Insights Trends
charts.description: Track your user research activities over time

userNeeds.title: User Needs
userNeeds.point1: Users expect faster product iteration cycles and want to see their feedback implemented quickly
userNeeds.point2: 78% of users need more intuitive data visualization interfaces to understand research results
userNeeds.point3: Team collaboration features are essential for medium to large teams, requiring real-time collaboration support

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.description: Product improvement suggestions based on data analysis
recommendations.point1: Optimize AI interview process to reduce average interview time to 15 minutes to improve completion rate
recommendations.point2: Add custom report template functionality to meet specific needs of different industries
recommendations.point3: Improve mobile experience as 67% of users want to view reports on mobile devices

painPoints.title: Pain Points
painPoints.description: Main issues users encounter during usage
painPoints.point1: Some users report a steep learning curve on first use, requiring better onboarding process
painPoints.point2: Data export format options are limited, users want support for more formats
painPoints.point3: Interview AI response speed is slow during peak hours, affecting user experience

opportunities.title: Growth Opportunities
opportunities.description: Potential product development directions and market opportunities
opportunities.point1: Education sector shows strong demand for user research tools, could develop specialized education version
opportunities.point2: Users show high interest in integrations with third-party tools (such as Slack, Notion)
opportunities.point3: Enterprise customers willing to pay premium for advanced analysis features and customization services
